description:
Counterpoint Research’s Mohit Agrawal insists that AI at the edge will be the future, but it depends on the growth of connectivity, smartness and security.

The post It’s All About Edge AI, But Where’s the Revenue? appeared first on EE Times.
title: It’s All About Edge AI, But Where’s the Revenue?

description:
Satoshi Hanazawa, Senior Vice President and Chief Product Officer of ABLIC   ABLIC is further expediting the process of adding extra value to its products. By incorporating peripheral logic circuits into analog circuit technology, the field in which it specializes, ABLIC will add extra functionality to its products and enhance their value. In addition to, […]

The post ABLIC is advancing the creation of high-value analog-digital integration, aiming for a leading position in niche semiconductor fields appeared first on EE Times.
title: ABLIC is advancing the creation of high-value analog-digital integration, aiming for a leading position in niche semiconductor fields

description:
The semiconductor industry has escaped regulation and scrutiny for decades, but greater mainstream awareness is bringing the prospect of greater regulation.

The post Chip Industry Awareness Brings Prospect of More Regulation on Several Fronts appeared first on EE Times.
title: Chip Industry Awareness Brings Prospect of More Regulation on Several Fronts
